lines.text: If my dog had a face like yours I'd shave his ass and teach him to walk backwards.
How did you get to be so cynical?
Practice.
getting blown up in nuclear war or having a 7-11 on every corner.
Don't give me a jerk-off handjob!
[Brian comes to school with a new, clean-cut look]
Brian, Halloween's not 'til October.
So?
So? Where's your board?
I felt like walking today!
Why are you wearing those clothes?
Oh, I know, his clothes are in the cleaners.
I bet his mom put him up to it.
I guess we all do unexpected things sometimes, don't we?
Can I ask you something personal?
Sure...
Where's the bathroom?
Do you know what a farm vet does? He helps cows get well so they can live long enough to be turned into Quarter Pounders. It's ridiculous!

[telling Brian about a house that burned down to skate the pool]
Besides, it burned down last week.

[points at Yabbo]
Yeah, he burned it!

[after picking up Brian at the police station]
Brian, the skateboard stays in the garage.
Heh! What you worried about? It's not gonna shit on the rug!
Why was he following you?
I dunno. He was just following me. Maybe he was a pervert.
Oh right, you jumped into the back of a pervert's car? What are you? Playing hard to get?
You know, if my dog had a face like yours, I'd shave his ass and teach him to walk backwards!

[While in the plane scouting for a pool]
Check it out, there's my mom's, there's my dad's house.
Hey, there's my Pizza Hut!
